name: Hard Rock Zombie Truck
description: Nothing complicated. All you have to do is to drive, burn up, knock down, shoot and blast zombies and monsters. And don't forget to have fun, of course! This light and a bit crazy 2D zombie shooter gives you a chance to have a pleasant truck journey along the world after zombie-apocalypse.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo (or equivalent) Memory: 1024 MB RAM Graphics: with 256 MB VRAM compatible with DirectX 9 DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 200 MB available space Sound Card: Sound device compatible with DirectX® 9.0
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or later Processor: Intel Core i3 (or equivalent) Memory: 2048 MB RAM Graphics: with 512 MB VRAM compatible with DirectX 9 DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 200 MB available space Sound Card: Sound device compatible with DirectX® 9.0
